values.alignmentText: Seoul has .NET roles in multinationals and outsourcing, but language and on-site needs limit Trey's options; expect steady, city-focused opportunities.

values.alignmentText: Seoul-area neighbors view South Korea positively for tech leadership and markets; Japan and China show occasional policy tensions.
